if your new to this game DO NOT PLAY. the SMURFS are brutal as fuck. any other game you start a new account and your good but if you start a new account here... and think your good and join competetive.... you will vs ppl who have been playing for 7 or so years. who have spent 100 plus dollars on this game. you will know who you are playing against when the ppl you are vs. have skins on their knives!!!! like thats rare as hell! i will never play this game again. until they fix the competetive gameplay. like i have wasted so much time vs ppl who have vs me that have so much time against me. like i have played a week here a week there but when i get online its like ppl tear me apart. i get more kills on apex than on here and thats saying something serious if i dont play pc games. fuhhhhh this game.
